title: Hierophant

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Investigate a player at night.
- Silence a player during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The target player will be blackmailed for the rest of the day.
- Your results are identical to that of the Investigator (See Post 35)
- You may choose to guess your target’s role immediately–if you are correct, gain a Faith Point.
- When you have accumulated 2 Faith points, the Saint will gain a Saint point.

desc:
Post 506
*The light is beautiful...but you do not have enough eyes to see it with.*
